channel.title: Server IP Needs Change!
channel.description:
Making a new thread because I can't reply to or edit my old one.
Originally I was using no-ip and because of their service shutdown I had to get it changed.
https://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=72.20.52.30
It should be "world1.zarpor.com"
Please update this for me, I've pmed moparisthebest about it numerous times and it has been several months without anything done.
There is nothing I could have done to avoid this situation. The fact I've spent thousands advertising here and I have the most votes out of any other server on the toplist, I think I would deserve some more consideration.
Please, it really doesn't take all that much effort to do this. Thank you.

item.title: Server IP Needs Change!
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I changed this awhile ago, I thought I replied to your PM when I did it but I might have forgotten.

Read full topic
